description:
Dia Zerva shows up for her live shoot, only to realize that the other model booked for the show has flaked out, meaning Dia will be receiving an intense level of attention all by herself for the next 6 hours.

A heavy iron collar is locked around her neck, and her torso is covered in almost 100 clothespins, which are ripped off at once after they have had a chance to clamp her skin for a while, ensuring the maximum intensity when the zipper is finally pulled off.

With no other model around, there is no rest for Dia. She is immediately strapped into a severe head harness and ball gag with her arms strapped up behind her. She is made to rotate as she is whipped hard all over her body.

The climax of the show comes as Dia is bound on top of a box as cyd thoroughly lathers her asshole, cunt and clit with his intense burning sauce. Dia’s screams, the look on her face, and her body movements and contortions are priceless as the sauce keeps getting hotter and hotter, seemingly with no upper limit.
title: Dia Zerva Live aka Feel the Burn
